name: Bonako

name: SISP
description: SISP is a financial institution responsible for managing activities related to the development and use of means of payment in Cape Verde, dealing, in particular, with the management of banking systems for national and international payments, issuance and management of debit cards, and provision of services linked to electronic systems for payments and information and data transfer and management.

name: Chatrace
description: Chatrace helps you to create chatbots to automate sales, marketing, and customer support with Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram, SMS, Telegram, and Web chatbot.
